    MicroJPEG ‚Äî The Smartest Online Image Compressor & RAW Converter

    Reduce JPEG, PNG, WebP, AVIF, TIFF, GIF, SVG, and over 65 RAW camera formats (CR2, NEF, ARW, DNG, ORF, RAF, RW2, etc.) by up to 90% while keeping perfect visual quality. No software installation, no signup required for 500 free operations per month.

    Why Thousands Choose MicroJPEG Every Month

    Lightning Fast

    Process images in under 3 seconds using latest AVIF/WebP encoders and multi-core RAW decoding.

    100% Private

    All files automatically deleted within 24 hours. GDPR compliant, no logs, no third-party sharing.

    Lossless & Lossy

    Choose perfect quality or maximum compression ‚Äî up to 90% smaller with no visible difference.

    65+ RAW Formats

    Full support for Canon CR2/CR3, Nikon NEF, Sony ARW, Fujifilm RAF, Olympus ORF, Panasonic RW2 and more.

    Batch Processing

    Premium users compress up to 20 images at once and download as ZIP in one click.

    Format Conversion

    Convert RAW ‚Üí JPEG/AVIF/WebP, PNG ‚Üí AVIF, JPEG ‚Üí WebP and 80+ other combinations.

    Developer API

    500 free API calls/month. Simple REST API with SDKs coming soon.

    WordPress Plugin

    Automatic compression on upload + bulk optimize your entire media library.

    How MicroJPEG Works ‚Äî 3 Simple Steps

    1

    Upload Your Images

    Drag & drop or select files. We support JPEG, PNG, WebP, AVIF, TIFF, SVG, GIF and all major RAW formats from Canon, Nikon, Sony, Fujifilm, Olympus, Panasonic and more.

    2

    Choose Settings

    Keep original format or convert to modern WebP/AVIF. Select quality level from lossless to maximum compression. Premium users get advanced controls.

    3

    Download Optimized Files

    Get instantly compressed images with full EXIF preserved. Download individually or as ZIP. Free users get 500 operations/month.
